title: Po Indru Neeyaga English Translation Lyrics Velai illa Pattathari Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Po indru neeyaaga -
The Love of Raghuvaran 
Singer: Dhanush
Lyrics: Dhanush
Movie: Velaiyilla Pattathari aka VIP
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Po Indru Neeyaga,
Va Naalai Naamaga.,
Unnai Pakamale,
onnum Pesamale
onnaa Seramale,
Yellam Koothadadhe

la la la la... oh oh oh .
mmmmmm ha ra ra ra ye..
la la la la... la oh oh oh .
nenju mmmmmm
ponnu ra ra ra ye..

Po Indru Neeyaga
Va Naalai Naamaaga.

Thaniyaave irundhu
verupppaagi pochu.
nee vandhadhaale
en sogam pochu.

perum moochu vitte
soodaana moochu
un vaasam pattu.
jaladhosam aachu
medhu medhuva nee pesum podhu
sugamaa sugamaa naan ketkuren.

un saara kaaththu
em pakkam paathu
idhaamaga aanaandhu
oru saathu saathu .

la la la la... oh oh oh .
mmmmmm ha re ra ra ra ye..
la la la la... la oh oh oh .
nenju mmmmmm
ponnu ra ra ra ye..

Po Indru Neeyaga,
Va Naalai Naamaga.
Unnai Pakamale,
onnum Pesamale
onnaa Seramale,
Yellam Koothadadhe

I tried my best :)
Go today, like "you".
come tomorrow, like "we".
without seeing you
without talking with you
without joing you
everything is dancing like anything

la la la la... oh oh oh .
mmmmmm ha ra ra ra ye..
la la la la... la oh oh oh .
heart is hmmm mmmmm
girl is hmmmm mmmmm

Go today, like "you".
come tomorrow, like "we".

being alone all the time
I hate myself.
after you came
my sadness has gone.

my breath gone hot
coz of sigh.
your smell on me
got my cold high.
when you talk slowly
I listen to it comfortably.

this breezy air
blowing my direction.
giving a pretty look
tapping on my head.

la la la la... oh oh oh .
mmmmmm ha re ra ra ra ye.

girl is hmmmm mmmmm
